trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>está definida ou seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: Manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento é útil quando você deseja exibir um menu de atalho, determinado pelo estado atual da linha ou valores que ele contém.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Quando você processa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento, o menu de atalho que você especificar o manipulador é mostrado sempre que o usuário clica uma linha, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>substituições de evento de menu de atalho da célula específica que foi clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento também ocorre sempre que o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é recuperada, ou programaticamente ou quando o usuário clica uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>propriedade para determinar o estado de uma linha ou valores que ele contém e usar essas informações para alterar ou modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é inicializada com o valor da linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade, que substitui o valor do evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar as penalidades de desempenho de definir a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>valor para várias linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `rowIndex` parameter value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor usa o `rowIndex` valor de parâmetro para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexé menor que -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the row that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o menu de atalho para a linha que gerou o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, essa propriedade contém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade se ele tiver sido definido para uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da linha que está solicitando um menu de atalho.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve additional information about the row.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para obter mais informações sobre a linha.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da linha que está solicitando um menu de atalho.
